tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I was looking for dental clinic when I came across Dental clinic. I visited the clinic for treatment of wisdom teeth. Dr Smita was very helpful. She took a full x-ray and explained all the problems in my teeth. Not only she fixed my current problems, she also fixed a problem I was experiencing from a treatment from some other Doctor. She is very professional and knowledgeable. 
I will recommend it every one as I live in New Zealand and didn‚Äôt had such experience there as I got in her clinic. She regularly contacted me after treatment to check on my recovery.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Smita was friendly and was keen on knowing my problem completely. She explained everything in very simple to understand terms. Her clinic is impeccably clean and all the instruments are very well maintained. I was especially satisfied with how her team took care of hygiene and cleanliness throughout the process. Her team followed up with me even after treatment. I am very happy overall, very satisfied with the doctor and her team and would recommend her to everyone.

tags: None

review:
I was very anxious before the extraction. She was very patient with me and dealt with my anxiety and made me comfortable. I was very relaxed during the procedure and she used the finest of needle for LA and I didn‚Äôt feel the pain . Just a slight prick . She understands the need of patient fully . Fully satisfied and would highly recommend .
Lots of luv

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Dental X-Ray,Dental Checkup (General),Wisdom Tooth Extraction,Dental Fillings,Dental Cleaning,
review:
Experience at The Dental story was amazing.
It never felt like you are visiting a Doctor.
I got my wisdom tooth extracted which is very painful and difficult treatment but here doctors and their theirnteam are so friendly and professionals that you dont have to worry at all.
After treatment services like regular calls from clinic to help you heel fast are really surprising.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Today I visited Dr. Smita's clinic for wisdom tooth extraction and found that Doctor is exceptionally intelligent, and soft spoken.  she briefly explained about tooth related problem and its cause.  Dr. shows very nice gesture by calling herself and ask me about the improvement after undergone treatment.

review:
I came to the dental story with a broken tooth. I needed an emergency appointment as I had a shoot to go to and my front tooth was  partly broken.
I was very happy that the team managed to accommodate me at very short notice and treatment was done in  a single sitting without any pain. The results are amazing. I have attached photos as well. They look so natural that no one can ever tell that something was wrong.  Amazing team of professionals and top notch service!
